text: @thecjpearson @NYGovCuomo Being a loudmouth arrogant idiot Scofflaw that uses your child as a political sheild shouldn't be thought of as a hero. She's an idiot and got what she deserved. Be considerate and not selfish and wear masks you numbnuts. #COVID19 is serious.
